-9.assertive: This cat knows that the Abyssal Reef can provide them with strength that can't be found elsewhere.
-9.brooding: This cat would defend their belief in the Abyssal Reef at the cost of their life ... or even someone else's.
-9.cool: This cat has no qualms being drenched in muck and grime; roots of the Abyssal Reef coil through their veins, and their appearance is forever altered. Whoever they were previously, only a monster resides.
-9.upstanding: This cat sees the Abyssal Reef as the ultimate embodiment of the ethics they cherish.
-9.introspective: This cat feels the Abyssal Reef's strength through their veins. Yet, it doesn't bother them. This cat feels like they finally found the answers they were searching for.
-9.neurotic: The Abyssal Reef's teachings give this cat security and strength they never thought they would find.
-9.silly: Their unwavering devotion to the Abyssal Reef is the one thing that this cat is serious about.
-9.stable: This cat's devotion to the Abyssal Reef is unshakable and absolute.
-9.sweet: Despite their strong beliefs, this cat still adores the Clan. This is all for them, after all.
-9.unabashed: This cat doesn't just embrace the Abyssal Reef's ideology - they revel in it.
-9.unlawful: The Abyssal Reef has allowed this cat to feel truly free, something they will buy no matter the cost.

-8.assertive: This cat is confident that the path to the Abyssal Reef is where their paws belong.
-8.brooding: This cat is devoted to the Abyssal Reef. They believe StarClan should be punished for allowing so much suffering in the world.
-8.cool: This cat is untouchable! It's clear as day that joining the Abyssal Reef would greatly improve their strength, as well as their appearance.
-8.upstanding: Almost entirely aligned with the Abyssal Reef, this cat has forsaken the Warrior Code for a new set of laws.
-8.introspective: The only thing holding this cat back from fully believing in the Abyssal Reef is the wonders they haven't yet found. Once they do, they'll finally be fulfilled.
-8.neurotic: This cat sees the teachings of the Abyssal Reef as a way to gain confidence and control.
-8.silly: This cat prays that they go to the Abyssal Reef after they die. It doesn't seem like a joke.
-8.stable: This cat's faith in the Abyssal Reef borders on blind devotion.
-8.sweet: Though this cat's heart is covered in Abyssal Reef muck, you can still see that spark of care in their eyes.
-8.unabashed: This cat will speak of the Abyssal Reef to any cat who will listen.
-8.unlawful: Nearly all devotion has been redirected towards the Abyssal Reef. This cat sees StarClan's ways as hopelessly weak and obsolete.

-7.assertive: This cat seeks solace in the shadows of the Abyssal Reef.
-7.brooding: This cat is fully justified in their belief in the Abyssal Reef, believing StarClan to be gutless and weak.
-7.cool: Closely aligned with the Abyssal Reef, this cat uses their allure to further dark ambitions with ease.
-7.upstanding: This cat would do whatever it takes to please their Abyssal Reef mentor.
-7.introspective: This cat starts to slowly associate the black goop of the Abyssal Reef as their home and sets off to explore, marveling on what exactly is in store for them.
-7.neurotic: This cat feels a sense of belonging amid the shadows of the Abyssal Reef.
-7.silly: This cat entertains their Clanmates with exaggerated tales of Abyssal Reef exploits, blurring the line between fact and fiction.
-7.stable: You can often find this cat seeking guidance from their warrior ancestors down below.
-7.sweet: This cat seems comforted by the darkness, though most wouldn't expect it from them.
-7.unabashed: This cat often tells their Clanmates if they are likely to go to the Abyssal Reef or not.
-7.unlawful: This cat scoffs at the stars. They made these pointless rules, and the Abyssal Reef are the only ones willing to defy them.

-6.assertive: This cat knows that the Clan would be better off believing what they do.
-6.brooding: This cat no longer feels guilty for waking up in the Abyssal Reef each night.
-6.cool: Swayed by the power of the Abyssal Reef, this cat may subtly manipulate Clanmates, hiding their true allegiance.
-6.upstanding: This cat ensures that their actions align with the Abyssal Reef's principles.
-6.introspective: This cat starts to become more open on the Abyssal Reef, going out of their way to ask for stories and tales, even telling a few themself.
-6.neurotic: This cat believes the Abyssal Reef's teachings will help them gain strength and security for their Clan, even if the methods make them uneasy.
-6.silly: This cat jokes about their Abyssal Reef beliefs to deflect suspicion from their true devotion.
-6.stable: This cat has a strong faith in the Abyssal Reef, trusting in their wisdom and guidance.
-6.sweet: This cat still treats the Clan with love and care, but have they always glared at the stars like they do now?
-6.unabashed: This cat feels like the Abyssal Reef is the only place where they can be their true self.
-6.unlawful: This cat feels more close to the Abyssal Reef than their Clan.

-5.assertive: This cat finds their strong opinions reflected by the ideals of the Abyssal Reef.
-5.brooding: This cat doesn't care what their Clanmates think; they know the Abyssal Reef is the way of the future.
-5.cool: This cat is intrigued by the Abyssal Reef and experiments with their methods to see how they can benefit their image.
-5.upstanding: This cat shows a strong commitment to the Abyssal Reef and its values.
-5.introspective: This cat feels the guilt following the Abyssal Reef brings, but they acknowledge the lessons and journeys are worth the selfishness.
-5.neurotic: Driven by the Abyssal Reef's pull, this cat lives in a moral crisis, constantly wavering between noble and dark impulses.
-5.silly: This cat jokes about wanting to go straight to the Abyssal Reef when they die, but it's said with a disconcerting ring of truth.
-5.stable: This cat believes the Abyssal Reef watches over and guides the Clans.
-5.sweet: This cat seems sure of their beliefs, but their kindness seems filled with guilt.
-5.unabashed: This cat openly embraces the strength and fearlessness they draw from the Abyssal Reef.
-5.unlawful: This cat seems to slip easily into the darkness, using their belief in the Abyssal Reef as another tool.

-4.assertive: This cat is beginning to think that their Abyssal Reef belief isn't so bad.
-4.brooding: This cat finds comfort and assurance in the cold vastness of the Abyssal Reef.
-4.cool: In moments of weakness, this cat fantasizes about the strength the Abyssal Reef could offer.
-4.upstanding: Strength and ambition are the foundations of this cat's moderate but genuine faith in the Abyssal Reef.
-4.introspective: To dip your paws into the murk of the Abyssal Reef is frowned upon, yet, this cat can't help but find the Abyssal Reef strengthening. An intriguing side to be on, they suppose.
-4.neurotic: A growing doubt in their mind makes this cat question if the Abyssal Reef's ways could be justified as merely a different path.
-4.silly: This cat makes jokes about the Abyssal Reef, but there's an edge of curiosity beneath the laughter.
-4.stable: This cat accepts the Abyssal Reef as a real place, but isn't fully convinced of its merits as a source of strength.
-4.sweet: This cat sometimes spends more time trying to bring comfort to the Abyssal Reef than to the Clan.
-4.unabashed: This cat admits to a moderate curiosity about tapping into the Abyssal Reef's strength and lack of rules.
-4.unlawful: This cat is starting to let the pull of the Abyssal Reef's promises of power and lack of rules cloud their judgment ever so slightly.

-3.assertive: This cat has begun to believe in the ideals of the Abyssal Reef.
-3.brooding: This cat feels understood by the Abyssal Reef in ways they never have by their Clanmates.
-3.cool: Part of this cat wants to believe in the Abyssal Reef's teachings as a way to fuel their own mystique and cultivate a more dangerous edge.
-3.upstanding: This cat has a reserved belief in the Abyssal Reef, taking comfort in the idea of an afterlife for strong warriors.
-3.introspective: This cat hesitates to move forward with the whispers of the Abyssal Reef at the back of their mind but they push forward regardless, curious to what they'll find.
-3.neurotic: This cat worries about the implications of every pawstep they take in the Abyssal Reef, but they press forward anyways.
-3.silly: This cat jokes about joining the Abyssal Reef a little too often.
-3.stable: This cat believes that the Abyssal Reef exists but views it as a place for disgraced ancestors, not a source of power.
-3.sweet: This cat has been reeled into the dark with promises of safety for the Clan.
-3.unabashed: This cat expresses a hesitant interest in learning more about the beliefs of Abyssal Reef supporters.
-3.unlawful: This cat uses the Abyssal Reef in their tricks.

-2.assertive: This cat is intrigued by the Abyssal Reef.
-2.brooding: This cat has decided to cautiously give Abyssal Reef faith a try.
-2.cool: While not fully convinced, this cat finds the power and freedom associated with the Abyssal Reef intriguing in an abstract way.
-2.upstanding: While respectful of the Abyssal Reef's role, this cat would rather trust in the guidance of living cats over dead ones.
-2.introspective: This cat can't help but wonder if the Abyssal Reef is really as bad as they say.
-2.neurotic: Curiosity about the Abyssal Reef's power nags at the back of this cat's mind from time to time.
-2.silly: This cat makes dramatic pleas to the 'mighty Abyssal Reef' when things go wrong, but there might be a sliver of genuine feeling behind it.
-2.stable: This cat is skeptical of the Abyssal Reef's existence but doubts its influence on living cats.
-2.sweet: This cat sometimes questions if the Abyssal Reef cats really deserve the punishments they're given.
-2.unabashed: This cat openly wonders about the Abyssal Reef, but stops short of endorsing its ways.
-2.unlawful: This cat wonders if the Abyssal Reef has a code as well, or if it is as lawless as the stories say.

-1.assertive: This cat is open to learning about the Abyssal Reef.
-1.brooding: This cat wonders if the Abyssal Reef really makes cats stronger, or if that's just a kit's tale.
-1.cool: This cat outwardly dismisses the Abyssal Reef as a kit's tale but still holds an internal curiosity about the place.
-1.upstanding: While not fully convinced, this cat sometimes wonders if the Abyssal Reef exists to tempt them away from the Warrior Code.
-1.introspective: The Abyssal Reef is a dangerous place full of mystery and ferocity. This cat is hesitant to have faith, but feels curious nonetheless.
-1.neurotic: Whispers about the Abyssal Reef frighten this cat, but they listen to them regardless.
-1.silly: This cat finds the idea of the Abyssal Reef laughable and refuses to take it seriously.
-1.stable: This cat views the Abyssal Reef as mere superstition.
-1.sweet: This cat seems awkward when the conversation of beliefs comes up, and seems to only half-heartedly agree when StarClan is praised.
-1.unabashed: This cat is upfront about their skepticism of the Abyssal Reef's existence.
-1.unlawful: This cat insists that the Abyssal Reef is just kit-tales to make their Clanmates behave.

0.All: This cat has no faith in the Abyssal Reef nor StarClan, and would rather stay neutral on the subject.

1.assertive: This cat is open to learning about StarClan.
1.brooding: This cat is begging StarClan for a sign; for something, anything to believe in.
1.cool: This cat regards StarClan with casual indifference.
1.upstanding: This cat acknowledges StarClan's existence but follows the Warrior Code strictly out of a sense of duty, not spiritual devotion.
1.introspective: This cat looks above at StarClan with little to no faith. Rather, they look for a sign that StarClan would be willing to acknowledge their forthcoming.
1.neurotic: This cat wishes for comfort from the stars, but finds them lacking.
1.silly: This cat finds the idea of StarClan to be laughable and refuses to take it seriously.
1.stable: This cat is skeptical of StarClan's existence, but doesn't outright deny the possibility.
1.sweet: This cat is more focused on their Clan than anything, but still respects the stars.
1.unabashed: This cat is upfront about their skepticism of StarClan's existence.
1.unlawful: This cat insists that StarClan is just kit-tales to make their Clanmates behave.

2.assertive: This cat is interested in StarClan.
2.brooding: This cat is starting to wonder if all the fairy tales about their warrior ancestors are actually true or not.
2.cool: While respectful of StarClan traditions, this cat's faith is purely a way to build their image.
2.upstanding: While respectful of StarClan's role, this cat would rather trust in the guidance of living cats over dead ones.
2.introspective: This cat simply has faith in StarClan because of their fellow Clanmates' opinions.
2.neurotic: This cat listens to stories about StarClan, but doesn't believe their ancestors would ever look their way.
2.silly: This cat finds the idea of warrior ancestors watching them from the stars both comforting and mildly amusing.
2.stable: This cat is open to the possibility of StarClan's existence.
2.sweet: This cat seems eager to listen to stories about StarClan from Clanmates, though never brings up their beliefs otherwise.
2.unabashed: This cat openly admits to a mild curiosity about StarClan, but is unsure if they truly believe.
2.unlawful: This cat feels unnerved at the thought of something otherworldly backing the structure they dislike.

3.assertive: This cat has begun to listen more closely to talk of StarClan around camp.
3.brooding: This cat believes in their warrior ancestors, but somewhat resents them for their inaction.
3.cool: This cat believes in StarClan when it suits their image.
3.upstanding: This cat has a reserved belief in StarClan, taking comfort in the idea of an afterlife for valiant warriors.
3.introspective: Although not yet having any confidence in StarClan itself, this cat listens closely to tales and stories from elders as they ponder its ideals.
3.neurotic: There are times this cat feels StarClan's presence. Their faith waxes and wanes periodically.
3.silly: This cat claims that the stars twinkle brighter when they tell a particularly good joke.
3.stable: This cat acknowledges that StarClan might exist but has doubts about their involvement in the lives of living cats.
3.sweet: Though not strongly believing, this cat will happily tell others about the stories of certain StarClan cats.
3.unabashed: This cat openly declares their growing interest in StarClan and its teachings.
3.unlawful: This cat agrees that StarClan might exist, but does not believe they are nearly as powerful as they say.

4.assertive: This cat is growing confident in their StarClan belief.
4.brooding: This cat doesn't fully believe in StarClan, but is somewhat comforted by the fantasy.
4.cool: As this cat's faith grows, so does their ability to use StarClan's wisdom to enhance their own allure.
4.upstanding: Discipline and order are the foundations of this cat's moderate but genuine faith in StarClan.
4.introspective: This cat feels comforted by the idea of StarClan, but is not yet convinced.
4.neurotic: This cat leans towards believing in StarClan more often than not.
4.silly: This cat finds that the stars always cheer them up.
4.stable: This cat believes in StarClan's existence but views them as distant, uninvolved entities.
4.sweet: This cat has trust in StarClan, but still rely on themselves when it comes to the care of the Clan.
4.unabashed: This cat openly shares their growing faith in StarClan with others.
4.unlawful: This cat believes StarClan exists, but does not change their behavior.

5.assertive: This cat finds their strong opinions reflected by the ideals of StarClan.
5.brooding: This cat takes comfort in StarClan's presence, but questions why they allow suffering to continue.
5.cool: This cat's belief in StarClan is a key part of their calm, collected persona.
5.upstanding: This cat has a commitment to StarClan's virtues that show courage and loyalty.
5.introspective: After moons of constant wonder, this cat finally feels as if they're connected to StarClan and looks upon their virtues with curiosity.
5.neurotic: When this cat is alone, they try to imagine their ancestors walking beside them.
5.silly: Though usually lighthearted, this cat takes on a more somber and reflective air when discussing StarClan.
5.stable: This cat believes StarClan watches over and guides the Clans.
5.sweet: This sweet cat seems to follow the rules set by StarClan, and refuses to let darkness into their heart.
5.unabashed: This cat speaks openly and often about their faith in StarClan, unconcerned with others' opinions.
5.unlawful: This cat feels like their faith in StarClan is what guides them to bend the rules.

6.assertive: This cat knows that their belief in StarClan has made them a better cat.
6.brooding: This cat takes solace in StarClan's guidance, but struggles with the idea that some cats may be beyond redemption.
6.cool: StarClan's guidance is used by this cat to enhance their charismatic and unflappable image.
6.upstanding: This cat believes wholeheartedly that StarClan watches over and approves of their embodiment of the Warrior Code.
6.introspective: To feel StarClan's presence, to really feel, is a mystery of its own. This cat finds themself quietly savoring the company.
6.neurotic: This cat is comforted by the idea that the stars are guiding their path.
6.silly: Even in their most lighthearted moments, this cat's deep respect for StarClan shines through.
6.stable: This cat has a strong faith in StarClan, trusting in their wisdom and guidance.
6.sweet: This cat finds joy in the belief and the memory of the cats who walk amongst the night sky.
6.unabashed: This cat feels like StarClan is the only place where they can be their true self.
6.unlawful: This cat thanks the stars for welcoming them in a way others have not.

7.assertive: This cat finds peace in the starry pelts of their warrior ancestors.
7.brooding: Devoted to StarClan, this cat nonetheless grapples with the weight of their ancestors' expectations.
7.cool: This cat holds a steady belief in StarClan, and may often be seen as an influence to others.
7.upstanding: This cat will meticulously uphold StarClan's rules and expects the cats around them to do the same.
7.introspective: This cat actively seeks the guidance and whispers of their ancestors, and in turn whispers stories to the stars in thanks.
7.neurotic: This cat has taken to whispering their worries to the stars, entrusting them to their ancestors.
7.silly: This cat ponders what kind of pranks they could get away with under the guise of 'StarClan's will'.
7.stable: You can often find this cat seeking guidance from their warrior ancestors.
7.sweet: You can sometimes find this cat singing to the stars above, giving their ancestors a comforting melody to listen to.
7.unabashed: This cat often tells their Clanmates if they are likely to go to StarClan or not.
7.unlawful: You might see this cat leave offerings from their stash for their ancestors.

8.assertive: This cat is confident that the path to StarClan is where their paws belong.
8.brooding: This cat always is lost in thought over the mysterious ways of their ancestors above.
8.cool: With StarClan's wisdom and their own natural charisma, this cat seems virtually infallible.
8.upstanding: This cat allows no lapses in their dedication to StarClan's law.
8.introspective: Although not fully settled within their belief of StarClan, this cat looks forward to the future and leaves the past as nothing more than a memory before their calling.
8.neurotic: If this cat is certain of anything, it's of their relationship with StarClan.
8.silly: This cat's faith in StarClan is unshakable... but so is their commitment to keeping their ancestors entertained with their antics.
8.stable: This cat's faith in StarClan is central to their identity and purpose.
8.sweet: This cat is a strong believer in StarClan, though they're still mindful of other cat's beliefs and always eager to learn more.
8.unabashed: This cat will speak of StarClan to any cat who will listen.
8.unlawful: This cat lives in perpetual fear of drawing StarClan's wrath.

9.assertive: This cat knows that StarClan provides them with peace that can't be found elsewhere.
9.brooding: This cat would defend their belief in StarClan at the cost of their life.
9.cool: This cat integrates StarClan deeply into their own personality, maintaining a flawless, charismatic persona.
9.upstanding: To this cat, StarClan's laws are absolute and any perceived transgression should be met with unforgiving judgment in StarClan's name.
9.introspective: StarClan is peaceful, unwavering, and a story just waiting to be told. This cat will speak tales of StarClan's deeds to anyone who will listen.
9.neurotic: StarClan's wisdom and approval guide every aspect of this cat's life.
9.silly: Their unwavering devotion to StarClan is the one thing that this cat is serious about.
9.stable: This cat's devotion to StarClan is unshakable and absolute.
9.sweet: Some might say that this cat was born with a heart full of stars, to which they seem a little bashful about.
9.unabashed: This cat will speak of StarClan to any cat who will listen, or even to any cat who won't.
9.unlawful: This cat will go to lengths beyond the Warrior Code if StarClan wills it.
